entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to drizzle near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
